column2: the one minor complaint that I have is Ba-Ba- Reeba packs you into this restaurant like sardines. If you suffer from Claustrophobia
column3: I'd think twice about dining here on a busy night. Also
column5: should say "circle jerk" on the door. The two measly urinals are so damn close to each other
column6: your junk is basically all over the dude next to you. And
column7: the one stall is even too small for a little person.
